EmailTemplate.description: Use this when request is sent by customer to multiple mailboxes. Remove mailboxes in body of message that do not apply.
EmailTemplate.name: Order Request - you've sent to multiple mailboxes
EmailTemplate.subject: Request sent to multiple mailboxes {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not submit your request to multiple Honeywell email addresses as this causes significant delays for you. Use this guide to find that one email address that will work the best and quickest for you:
Spares/OEM:
· Orders, email orders@honeywell.com
· Order status, email orderstatus@honeywell.com
· Order changes, email orderchanges@honeywell.com
· Order quotes, email quotes@honeywell.com
Repairs:
· Quote approvals, email cpsquotesapprovals@honeywell.com
· Vendome, France site, email vendomerepairs@honeywell.com
· Bendix King-Olathe site, email olatheservicecenter@honeywell.com
· All other repair order or status inquiry, email aerorepairs@honeywell.com
Aircraft on Ground:
· AOG, email AOG@honeywell.com
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE:
{!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
